achievements.name: Forum Noob!
achievements.req: You created your profile on Stack Overflow and MSDN and emailed the links to micurd

achievements.name: First Post!
achievements.req: You answered your first question on one of the forums

achievements.name: Answer Bunny
achievements.req: You can get one every time you answer a question as long as you remember to ask for it :)

achievements.name: Post Assist
achievements.req: You helped a forum owner answer a post, you can also get one of these every time you help a forum owner answer a question and he/she remembers to let us know about it

achievements.name: Pre-School
achievements.req: You have 5 answers on the forums

achievements.name: Middle-School
achievements.req: You have at least 10 answers on the forums

achievements.name: High School
achievements.req: You have at least 15 answers on the forums

achievements.name: College
achievements.req: You have at least 20 answers on the forums

achievements.name: Senior Citizen
achievements.req: You have at least 50 answers on the forums
